description: For all fans of the "Frat Pack", this soundboard provides 350 sound clips from 7 actors from 15 movies all in one app: Meet the Parents, Zoolander, Old School, Along Came Polly, Dodgeball, Anchorman, Meet the Fockers, Wedding Crashers, 40 Year Old Virgin, Talladega Nights, Blades of Glory, Knocked Up, Walk Hard, Stepbrothers, Tropic Thunder. While most soundboard apps available offer on average of 20 sounds or even only 5 sounds for a dollar, this soundboard has 350 sounds for $.99. The Frat Pack soundboard also offers an attractive and intuitive user interface and the ability to request additional sounds which is a rarity among other soundboard apps. Now keep in mind the amount of sound clips per movie varies; there are 4 sound clips for Meet the Parents while there are 53 sound clips for Zoolander. On average there are 23 sounds per movie. Please email me your requests and they will be included in an update. I already have an update planned that will include: 8 additional actors and 17 additional movies. With that free update you will have over 600 sound clips fromm 15 actors from over 30 movies all in the Palm of your hand.
